info.name: Pioneered
info.author: Warker/nschloe/dj3730/jusko
info.description: Midi Mapping for the Pioneer DDJ-400

control.description: PAD 1 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 1 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 1 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 1 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
TEMPO (DECK1) - fader - Tempo control MSB
TEMPO (DECK2) - fader - Tempo control MSB
PAD 2 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 2 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 2 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 2 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 3 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 3 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 3 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 3 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
BEAT FX LEVEL - rotate to set
PAD 4 (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 4 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 4 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 4 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

PAD 5 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 5 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 5 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

TRIM - rotate

PAD 6 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
PAD 6 (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - set hotcue
PAD 6 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

PAD 7 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

PAD 7 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

PAD 8 +SHIFT (DECK1) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue

PAD 8 +SHIFT (DECK2) HOT CUE MODE - press - delete hotcue
EQ HI - rotate
EQ HI - rotate
PLAY/PAUSE (DECK1) - press - Play/Pause
PLAY/PAUSE (DECK2) - press - Play/Pause
EQ MID - rotate
EQ MID - rotate
CUE (DECK1) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
CUE (DECK2) - press - Set/Call Cue, Back Cue
HEADPHONES MIXING - rotate - Monitor Balance
HEADPHONES LEVEL - rotate - Headphone gain
EQ LOW - rotate
EQ LOW - rotate
LOOP IN/4 BEAT (DECK1) - press - Set loop in
LOOP IN/4 BEAT (DECK2) - press - Set loop in
BEAT FX CH SELECT CH1 - slide - Select FX on DECK 1
LOOP OUT (DECK1) - press - Set loop out
LOOP OUT (DECK2) - press - Set loop out
BEAT FX CH SELECT CH2 - slide - Select FX on DECK 2
CHANNELFADER - slider
CHANNELFADER - slider
BEAT FX CH SELECT MASTER - slide - Select FX on Master
COLOR FX CH1 - rotate - Color Effect Knob
COLOR FX CH2 - rotate - Color Effect Knob
CROSSFADER - slider
PAD 1 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat backwards
PAD 1 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat backwards
TEMPO (DECK1) - fader - Tempo control LSB
TEMPO (DECK2) - fader - Tempo control LSB
PAD 2 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat forwards
PAD 2 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 1 Beat forwards
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL SIDE (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
PAD 3 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats backwards
PAD 3 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats backwards
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode On (DECK1) - rotate - Scratch
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode On (DECK2) - rotate - Scratch
MIDI Learned from 288 messages.
PAD 4 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats forwards
PAD 4 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 2 Beats forwards
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK1) - rotate - Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER Vinyl mode Off (DECK2) - rotate - Pitch bend
PAD 5 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats backwards
PAD 5 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats backwards
TRIM - rotate
TRIM - rotate
PAD 6 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats forwards
PAD 6 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 4 Beats forwards
PAD 7 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats backwards
PAD 7 (DECK1) +SHift BEAT JUMP MODE - press - decrease Beatjump by a factor of 16
PAD 7 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats backwards
PAD 7 (DECK2) +Shift BEAT JUMP MODE - press - decrease Beatjump by a factor of 16
PAD 8 (DECK1) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats forwards
PAD 8 (DECK1) +SHift BEAT JUMP MODE - press - increase Beatjump by a factor of 16
PAD 8 (DECK2) BEAT JUMP MODE - press - Jump 8 Beats forwards
PAD 8 (DECK2) +Shift BEAT JUMP MODE - press - increase Beatjump by a factor of 16

EQ HI - rotate

JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK2) - rotate - Search (Fast Pitch bend)

EQ MID - rotate
HEADPHONES MIXING - rotate - Monitor Balance
HEADPHONES LEVEL - rotate - Headphone gain

EQ LOW - rotate
PAD 1 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 1 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 1 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 1 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

PAD 2 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

PAD 2 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

PAD 3 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 3 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 3 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

PAD 4 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 4 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 4 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

CHANNELFADER - slider
PAD 5 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 5 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 5 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 5 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track

PAD 6 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 6 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 6 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
JOG DIAL PLATTER (DECK1) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) Scratching/Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER (DECK2) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) Scratching/Pitch bend
PAD 7 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 7 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 7 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 7 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 8 (LEFT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 8 (LEFT)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
PAD 8 (RIGHT) SAMPLE MODE - press - Play Sample or Load Track
PAD 8 (Right)+SHIFT SAMPLE MODE - press - Stop Playback or Eject Track
FILTER CH1 - rotate - Filter Effect Knob
FILTER CH2 - rotate - Filter Effect Knob
CUE/LOOP CALL RIGHT + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - quick jump forwards
CUE/LOOP CALL RIGHT + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - quick jump forwards
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT + SHIFT (DECK1) - press - quick jump back
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT + SHIFT (DECK2) - press - quick jump back
Shift (DECK1)
Shift (DECK2)
CROSSFADER - slider
BROWSE - rotate - Scroll tracklist/tree view
BROWSE - press - Move cursor between track list and tree view
BROWSE +SHIFT - press - Move cursor between track list and tree view
BEAT FX ON/OFF +SHIFT - press - Disable all enabled Beat FX Slots
LOAD (DECK1) - press - Load a Track into Deck 1
PLAY/PAUSE +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Reverse playback in Slip Mode while held (Censor)
PLAY/PAUSE +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Reverse playback in Slip Mode while held (Censor)
BEAT FX ON/OFF - press - Toggle FX in the selected Slot
LOAD (DECK2) - press - Load a Track into Deck 2
CUE +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Jump to track start
CUE +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Jump to track start
BEAT LEFT - press - select effect unit 1
BEAT RIGHT - press - select effect unit 2
PADFX1 Left
PADFX2 Left
PADFX3 Left
PADFX4 Left
PADFX5 Left
PADFX6 Left
PADFX7 Left
PADFX8 Left
SHIFT + LOOP IN (DECK1) - Loop in adjust (using jog wheel)
SHIFT + LOOP IN (DECK2) - Loop in adjust (using jog wheel)
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK1) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
RELOOP/EXIT (DECK2) - press - (loop off) Reloop, (loop on) Loop exit
SHIFT + LOOP OUT (DECK1) - Loop out adjust (using jog wheel)
SHIFT + LOOP OUT (DECK2) - Loop out adjust (using jog wheel)
RELOOP/EXIT +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Reloop and stop
RELOOP/EXIT +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Reloop and stop
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK1) - press - half active loop
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK2) - press - half active loop
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK1) - press - double active loop
CUE/LOOP CALL LEFT (DECK2) - press - double active loop
CUE Channel - press - toggle Headphone Cue
CUE Channel - press - toggle Headphone Cue
BEAT SYNC (DECK1) - press - Beat Sync to Master deck
BEAT SYNC (DECK2) - press - Beat Sync to Master deck
BEAT SYNC LONG PRESS (DECK1) - press - Set as Master deck
BEAT SYNC LONG PRESS (DECK2) - press - Set as Master deck
BEAT SYNC +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - change Tempo range
BEAT SYNC +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - change Tempo range
PAD 1 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/4 Beatloop
PAD 1 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/4 Beatloop
PAD 2 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/2 Beatloop
PAD 2 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/2 Beatloop
PAD 3 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/1 Beatloop
PAD 3 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 1/1 Beatloop
MIDI Learned from 2 messages.
MIDI Learned from 2 messages.
PAD 4 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 2 Beatloop
PAD 4 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 2 Beatloop
PAD 5 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 4 Beatloop
PAD 5 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 4 Beatloop
PAD 6 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 8 Beatloop
PAD 6 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 8 Beatloop
BEAT LEFT + shift - select previous effect for the current unit
PAD 7 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 16 Beatloop
PAD 7 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 16 Beatloop
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK1) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
JOG DIAL PLATTER +SHIFT (DECK2) - touch - enable (on touch) / disable (on release) highspeed Pitch bend
PAD 8 (DECK1) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 32 Beatloop
PAD 8 (DECK2) BEAT LOOP MODE - press - 32 Beatloop
Shift + Left CUE - Toggle quantize on/off (Deck1)
CUE Channel +SHIFT - press - Adjust BPM to match tapped BPM
Shift + Right CUE - Toggle quantize on/off (Deck2)
CUE Channel +SHIFT - press - Adjust BPM to match tapped BPM
BEAT RIGHT + shift - select next effect for the current unit
